install.name: VirtueMart category
install.author: Studio 42
install.copyright: Copyright (C) Virtuemart team , Kohl Patrick All rights reserved.
install.description: Shows a 2 level category list from VirtueMart.

param.name: Parent_Category_id
param.label: Parent category id
param.description: This defines the category to list (0 For root dir).

param.name: layout
param.label: Menu Type
param.description: Menu with accordeon, only open active category, open all children category

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items
